TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You receive one duck, instead of the nothing that you wished for.

I wish for giant fruits.

And with that, giant fruit bats.

I wish I had wheels! No reason, just wheels. And yes, they need to rotate. I'd also like an isolated island nowhere near any scientists.

Granted. You have spinning wheels instead of legs. No brakes and no steering.

I wish I could kill 5 people I hate the most without any bad consequences for me.
Granted. You suddenly have a feeling of intense hatred for yourself, and the four clones of you that just magically appeared.

Granted. You receive one duck, instead of the nothing that you wished for.

I wish for 1.21 gigawatts

Granted. You are struck by lightning.

I wish to develop feasible weather control technology.

Granted, but during a test run of your experimental weather manipulator it malfunctioned and you got blown far-far-away by a hurricane. You've been reported as missing, and with your disappearance the project got cancelled and forgotten about.

Hey u never said u wanted to finish its developement...

I wish for a night-shift job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria!

Edited April 6, 2015 by Overfloater

Granted... the animatronics kill you by the 3rd night. Were you expecting anything else?

I wish that I had remembered to wish for something last time.

granted. Because of causality the current "you" ceases to exist.

I wish for SCIENCE!

Granted. You've just accidentally invented a bigger atom bomb when messing with a reactor. You don't live long day to realize it.

I wish I didn't accidentally 42 mb.

Granted. you don't 42 mb,but instead go to 1gb and your computer implodes.

I wish that i would have the ability to insta-teleport places.

Granted, guess what happens when the atoms of your body occupy the places of atoms at the point of arrival?

I wish all people were smart

Granted, all people are smart, that is for donkeys.hope that

I wish to Na/N

congrats. you are now Na/N-ing. enjoy being broken for the rest of your life.

I wish to not school. (horrid grammar was on purpose)

Granted you will work for food for the rest of your life.

I wish being rich and healthy here and now.

granted, a giant pile of money falls onto your head. You will suffocate in approximately one minute.

I wish for a perfectly safe, round trip to mars.

Granted. You are so rich that you starve, because no one at the store can break a 1000$

Ninja'd

Granted, but in a fit of stupidity, you drink the water.

I wish I wasn't ninja'd

Granted. You are isntead Samurai'd. Which hurts a deal more.

I wish we could start Samuraing posts.

Granted. But since you lack honor, you are forced to commit seppuku.

I wish for a good lunch today.

granted, your lunch is now <something you don't like>

i wish for a better laptop

Granted, but it has a virus.

I wish to be an astronaut.
Granted. You are also a farmer

Granted, your an astronaut, but your rocket as a flaw.

I wish that it now summer...

Granted you use hyper edit and to make it summer everybody die from teleporting

i wish for feelings

granted, you can only feel happy and sad. nothing else.

(you did say feelings)

i wish for good ainivirus.
